Once your account is deleted, all of its: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will also be permanently deleted. Please confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
Ni i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔra yen, a ka nafolo ni a ka kunnafoniw bɛɛ bɛna bɔ yen kudayi. I ka i ka tɔgɔlasɛbɛn sɛbɛn walasa k’a jira ko i b’a fɛ k’i ka jatebɔsɛbɛn bɔ yen kudayi.
